column4: I have an old scanner, it has a 37 pin connector attached to an old computer using an adapter card on an ISA slot. I want to connect this to a new computer, but am having trouble finding a card/adapter that will connect. it has 19 pins on top, 18 on bottom, looks like a parallel port
##hardware or #ubuntu-offtopic would be a better place to ask.  #ubuntu is for Ubuntu support only.
You need to be registered and identified to join.
